CASE_DETAILS_HEARING_ON_OTHER_APPEAL_POS: to see other cases associated with this Veteran.

ATTORNEY_QUEUE_PAGE_ON_HOLD_TASKS_DESCRI: When a hold is complete, cases here will automatically return to the Assigned tab.

TASKS_NEED_ASSIGNMENT_ERROR_MESSAGE: Cases marked with exclamation points need to be assigned to you through DAS. Please contact your judge or senior counsel to create preliminary DAS assignments.

JUDGE_EVALUATE_DECISION_ADDITIONAL_FACTO: Share more details about your evaluation

HEARING_SCHEDULE_BUILD_WELCOME_PAGE_BUIL: To build the schedule, please download one of the templates and fill it with the appropriate data. Then, click the "Upload files" button to import your completed .xlsx file.
HEARING_SCHEDULE_UPLOAD_PAGE_INSTRUCTION: Please select the file you are uploading and choose a date range.
ASSIGN_WIDGET_NO_ASSIGNEE_DETAIL: Please select someone to assign the tasks to.
ASSIGN_WIDGET_ASSIGNMENT_ERROR_DETAIL: One or more tasks couldn't be assigned.
ASSIGN_WIDGET_ASSIGNMENT_ERROR_DETAIL_MO: Please reassign tasks from your assign page
ASSIGN_WIDGET_DROPDOWN_SECONDARY_LABEL: Enter the name of an attorney or judge:
HEARING_SCHEDULE_REVIEW_ASSIGNMENTS_ALER: We have assigned your video hearings

Please review the following assignments for any errors. You can confirm the schedule to upload this to VACOLS or use go back to upload another file.
HEARING_SCHEDULE_REVIEW_ASSIGNMENTS_MODA: You are about to upload these assignments to VACOLS. Once this is done, you cannot perform this upload for the selected date range again. You will have to make individual edits to the schedule.
HEARING_SCHEDULE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You can view your uploaded schedule by clicking the link below
MARK_TASK_COMPLETE_COPY: You can find this case in the completed tab of your queue.
MARK_TASK_COMPLETE_CONFIRMATION_DETAIL: If you've made a mistake, please email %s to manage any changes.
CANCEL_TASK_MODAL_DETAIL: Cancelling this task will return it to the assigner

CANCEL_TASK_CONFIRMATION_DETAIL: Task for %s's case has been cancelled
HEARING_SCHEDULE_COMPLETE_ADMIN_MODAL: Marking this task as complete will remove this admin action from your active tasks.

ADD_COLOCATED_TASK_INSTRUCTIONS_LABEL: Provide instructions and context for this action:
ADD_COLOCATED_TASK_CONFIRMATION_DETAIL: If you need to make any changes, please email your administration action team.
ADD_HEARING_ADMIN_TASK_CONFIRMATION_DETA: The task has been placed in your teams queue.
COLOCATED_ACTION_SEND_TO_ANOTHER_TEAM_SU: Select the team you'd like to send this administrative action to
COLOCATED_ACTION_SEND_TO_ANOTHER_TEAM_CO: %s's case has been sent to the %s team.
COLOCATED_ACTION_PLACE_HOLD_COPY: Select the total number of days for the hold
COLOCATED_ACTION_PLACE_CUSTOM_HOLD_COPY: Enter a custom number of days for the hold

MODAL_CANCEL_ATTORNEY_CHECKOUT_PROMPT: Are you sure you want to cancel?
MODAL_CANCEL_ATTORNEY_CHECKOUT: All changes made to this page will be lost, except for the adding, editing, and deleting of issues.
SPECIAL_ISSUES_PAGE_NOTE: Select the special issues that pertain to this case. Cases with special issues are routed to specific groups who are in charge of adjusting the case.
SPECIAL_ISSUES_DIC_OR_PENSION_SECTION: Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) or Pension:
HEARING_ASSIGN_TASK_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_DETA: You can continue to assign tasks to yourself and others using this queue.
CASE_TIMELINE_HEADER: Below is the history of this case. Soon, you'll be able to see many more details.
DECISION_ISSUE_MODAL_TITLE: Describe what the Veteran is appealing and what you decided.
DECISION_ISSUE_MODAL_SUB_TITLE: You can also add additional decisions to better address the Veteran's concerns or situation.
DECISION_ISSUE_MODAL_DESCRIPTION_EXAMPLE: Ex: Entitlement to a 10% rating for arthritis of the right knee is granted
DECISION_ISSUE_MODAL_CONNECTED_ISSUES_DE: Do you want to add this decision to other issues on appeal? This could occur when you determine that two or more issues should receive a single decision.
DECISION_ISSUE_MODAL_CONNECTED_ISSUES_EX: Ex: Service connection for restless leg syndrome (right) and Service connection for restless leg syndrome (left) should be Service connection for restless leg syndrome (bilateral).
DECISION_ISSUE_PAGE_EXPLANATION: Add decisions to each issue the Veteran is appealing. Any decisions you add must be connected to at least one issue on appeal. This helps Caseflow gather metrics on BVA decisions and meet AMA reporting requirements.
DECISION_ISSUE_CONFIRM_DELETE_WITH_CONNE: Deleting this decision will also remove it from other issues you've added it to.
DECISION_ISSUE_CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this decision?
UNAUTHORIZED_PAGE_ACCESS_MESSAGE: You aren't authorized to use this part of Caseflow yet.
NO_RELATIONSHIPS: This Veteran currently has no known relationships. If you have access, please add the claimant to the Corporate Database to continue processing this intake. If you do not have access, please
CLAIMANT_NOT_FOUND_START: Please select the claimant listed on the form. If you do not see the claimant in the options below, and you have access, please add the claimant to the Corporate Database to continue processing this intake. If you do not have access, please
WITHDRAW_HEARING_MODAL_BODY: Withdrawing this hearing request will remove this veteran from the hearing pool.
WITHDRAW_HEARING_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_TITLE: You have successfully withdrawn %s's hearing request
WITHDRAW_HEARING_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_BODY: %s has been removed from the hearing schedule and has been sent to the next appropriate location
